info.title: Kakiyo API
info.description: API for automating LinkedIn outreach campaigns with AI-powered conversations

get.description: Verifies that the provided API key is valid and returns information about the associated team
Returns all campaigns for the authenticated team

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of campaigns to return

post.description: Creates a new outreach campaign

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the campaign to update

delete.description: Permanently delete a campaign and all associated data

post.description: Pauses an active campaign

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the campaign to pause

post.description: Resumes a paused campaign

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the campaign to resume

get.description: Returns statistics for a specific campaign

post.description: Adds multiple prospects to a campaign
Distributes a batch of prospects evenly across multiple campaigns using intelligent load balancing

message.example: Minimum 2 campaigns required for Round Robin distribution

403.description: Campaign does not belong to your team

message.example: Campaign campaign_12345abcde does not belong to your team

post.description: Adds a single prospect to a campaign

delete.description: Delete multiple prospects in a single operation

get.description: Returns all prospects associated with a campaign
Advanced search and filtering across all prospects

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Text search across prospect names and headlines

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by conversation status (numeric status code)

delete.description: Delete a single prospect and all associated data

get.description: Returns details of a specific prospect conversation

post.description: Pauses a conversation with a prospect
Resumes a paused conversation with a prospect
Marks a prospect as qualified

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all Do Not Contact entries for your team

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of entries to skip for pagination

total.description: Count of entries in current response (not total across all pages)

post.description: Add a single LinkedIn URL to your team's Do Not Contact list

url.description: LinkedIn profile URL to add to DNC list

message.example: Added to Do Not Contact list

get.description: Check if a specific LinkedIn URL is on your team's Do Not Contact list

post.description: Bulk import multiple LinkedIn URLs to your team's Do Not Contact list

message.example: Bulk import completed: 3 added, 1 duplicates, 0 errors

delete.description: Remove a specific LinkedIn URL from your team's Do Not Contact list

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the DNC entry to delete

403.description: Unauthorized - entry belongs to different team

get.description: Returns all products for the authenticated team

post.description: Creates a new product

get.description: Returns all prompt templates for the authenticated team

post.description: Creates a new prompt template

get.description: Returns all agents for the authenticated team

post.description: Creates a new agent

get.description: Returns details of a specific agent

put.description: Updates an agent's working hours and scheduling settings. Changes are applied immediately and the scheduler is re-triggered if the agent is running.

403.description: Forbidden - agent belongs to another team

post.description: Sets up an agent with LinkedIn credentials and location
Pauses an agent's activities
Resumes a paused agent

get.description: Returns all webhooks for the authenticated team

post.description: Creates a new webhook endpoint that will receive event notifications

parameters.name: webhookId
parameters.description: ID of the webhook to update

parameters.name: webhookId
parameters.description: ID of the webhook to delete

get.description: Returns all available webhook event types

post.description: Sends a test event to all matching webhooks

404.description: No webhooks found for this event

get.description: Get a list of available webhook event types for testing

description.example: Triggered when a prospect is marked as qualified

get.description: Get an example payload for a specific webhook event type

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event type to get an example for

get.description: Get comprehensive analytics and performance metrics for your entire team
Get detailed analytics for a specific campaign
Get a list of all available AI models with pricing information
Get detailed information about a specific AI model
Returns all client workspaces for the authenticated agency. Agency plan required.

post.description: Creates a new client workspace for the agency. Agency plan required.

name.description: Display name for the client workspace

delete.description: Permanently deletes a client workspace and cleans up all associated resources. Agency plan required.

403.description: Workspace does not belong to this team

post.description: Invites a client user to the workspace. Sends an invitation email with a magic link. Agency plan required.

email.description: Email address of the client to invite

roles.description: Roles to assign to the client

delete.description: Removes a client from the workspace by email address. Agency plan required.

email.description: Email address of the client to remove

post.description: Assigns an agent to the workspace. Propagates permissions to all agent campaigns, chats, and prospects. Agency plan required.

403.description: Agent or workspace does not belong to this team

delete.description: Removes an agent from the workspace. Removes client permissions from all agent campaigns, chats, and prospects. Agency plan required.

403.description: Agent or workspace does not belong to this team

Workspace.description: A client workspace for agency management

clientTeamId.description: Internal team identifier for client member management

example.painPoint: low response rates on cold outreach

headline.example: VP of Sales at Acme Inc
VP of Sales at Acme Inc

about.example: Experienced sales leader with over 15 years in the software industry...

content.example: Hi John, I noticed you're leading the sales team at Acme Inc. I wanted to reach out because we've been helping companies like yours improve their response rates on cold outreach. Would you be open to a quick chat about how we might be able to help?

description.example: Sales Engagement Pro is an AI-powered platform that helps sales teams automate and optimize their outreach efforts...

Sales Engagement Pro is an AI-powered platform that helps sales teams automate and optimize their outreach efforts. The solution includes multi-channel communication capabilities, personalized messaging at scale, advanced analytics, and CRM integration.

Key benefits include:
- 3x increase in response rates compared to traditional outreach
- 70% reduction in time spent on manual follow-ups
- Seamless integration with existing CRM systems
- Real-time insights on prospect engagement
- Smart prioritization of high-potential leads

Our customers typically see ROI within the first 60 days and experience a 40% increase in sales pipeline generation.

message.example: Please enter the verification code sent by LinkedIn to your email/phone
Please enter the verification code sent by LinkedIn to your email/phone

workingHours.description: Configure when the agent should be active

days.description: Working days (Mon-Sun). Format: 7 values separated by colons, 1=working, 0=off

limits.description: Daily activity limits for the agent

$id.description: Unique identifier for the DNC entry

teamId.description: Team ID that owns this entry

$updatedAt.description: Timestamp when entry was last updated

message.example: Too many requests. Please try again later.

resetTime.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) when the rate limit resets
